dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 8268 IH: Disarm the IRS Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Gaetz (for himself, Mr. Gosar, Mr. Duncan, and Mrs. Greene of Georgia) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To prohibit the Internal Revenue Service from acquiring ammunition.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Disarm the IRS Act.

section.header: Internal Revenue Service prohibited from acquiring ammunition
section.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, the Internal Revenue Service may not acquire (by purchase or otherwise) any ammunition after the date of the enactment of this Act.
